item.title: Cycling Lands End to John O'Groats
item.author: m.harper@outlook.com (Michael Harper)
item.description: Back in May 2016, a friend and I undertook one of the challenges which we had wanted to do for years and cycled the length of the United Kingdom from Land’s End to John O’ Groats. It was a fantastic experience and something I would love to do again one day. This blog provides a summary of our trip and aims to aid anyone who may be planning their own trip.
